message: Accept my generous offer and we can call it a day!
Take it or leave it, Alice! This is my best offer so far!
Meet me halfway, Bob! Let's make a deal!
You're getting desperate, Alice. This is my next best offer.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Meet me at 3:1 or walk away!
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't make me have to take it all!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me at 4:1 or I'll take my ball and go home!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not backing down now.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're not getting any more generous, are you, Alice? This is my last offer.
It's now or never, Bob. Let's split it down the middle and be done with it!
